short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur the match scores for ESPN games recaps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This spoiler shield for ESPNFans is a must-have Chrome extension for sports enthusiasts who love to watch game recaps without knowing the final scores. This extension seamlessly blurs out the scores on @ESPNFans game recaps on Youtube, allowing you to enjoy the thrill of the game as if you were watching it live.
